items.title: National Advertising Review Board Recommends Essor Group Discontinue Remineralization, Whitening, and Mouthwash Claims for Boka Oral Care Products
items.description: A panel of the National Advertising Review Board, the appellate advertising body of BBB National Programs, recommended that Essor Group, Inc. discontinue claims for its Boka brand of teeth remineralization, teeth whitening, and mouthwash products.New York, NY, July 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- A panel of the National Advertising Review Board, the appellate advertising body of BBB National Programs, recommended that Essor Group, Inc. discontinue claims for its Boka brand of teeth remineralization

items.title: AHAM Supplier Guide Gains Traction & Connects Home Appliance Industry with Suppliers
items.description: The Association of Home Appliance Manufacturers (AHAM) proudly announces the growing impact of the AHAM Supplier Guide, a powerful matchmaking tool that includes industry suppliers across a wide range of categories. This milestone underscores the guide's growing value as a strategic resource for procurement professionals and manufacturers in the home appliance sector.

items.title: Hotwire Names Charlotte Harvey as UK Managing Director to Accelerate Growth and Expand Market Leadership
items.description: LONDON, July 21, 2025--Hotwire, the global communications and marketing consultancy, today announced the appointment of Charlotte Harvey as its new UK Managing Director, marking a pivotal step in the agency’s UK growth strategy.

items.title: UBS Trims P&G (PG) Price Target, Maintains Buy Rating
items.description: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is one of the most profitable consumer stocks to buy now. UBS analyst Peter Grom lowered his price target on The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) to $180 from $186 while maintaining a Buy rating, citing refined estimates ahead of the company’s fiscal fourth-quarter results. Despite the downward adjustment, the […]
